column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " So , Bumi ... how did you end up escaping your imprisonment in Omashu ? "
#Text=Bumi says : " Escape ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " Taking back my city !
#Text=You 've got no firepower .
#Text=And it 's payback time !
#Text=" Suki says : " Wow !
#Text=You took back your whole city all by yourself !
#Text=" Bumi says : " So what about you guys ?
#Text=Did you do anything interesting on the day of the eclipse ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Nah .
#Text=" Sokka says : " No , not really .
#Text=" Aang says : " I need to look deep inside myself .
#Text=" Kuruk says : " I am Avatar Kuruk .
#Text=When I was young , I was always a go - with - the - flow kind of Avatar .
#Text=People seemed to work out their own problems , and there was peace and good times in the world .
#Text=But then , I lost the woman I loved to Koh , the Face Stealer .
#Text=It was my fault .
#Text=If I had been more attentive and more active , I could 've saved her .
#Text=Aang , you must actively shape your own destiny and the destiny of the world .
#Text="
